channel.title: HBG Scape V3 - OMFG - What you would like to see
channel.description:
I am in the mood to go ahead and start creating my latest server, HBG Scape V3...
I decided to get a poll as to what you all would like to see in this next version of my line of servers...
Please vote and help me out.
Also if there is something that isn't lsited up there, let me know what it is when you post...
ALSO, Please tell me what server you would like best for me to use as a base server, or continue with the one im on (hiyascape base)
Please let me know :) Can't wait to release this for all of you!
HBGScape V2: (details of my V2) Home is black knights hideout underground It has jad at mage training area Kq in her area Veng works perfectly Range only works close up Mage works, but has timers that make pking difficult in it... Teaming pk area is as mage bank Solo pk is tzhaar area Bandos is best armor Obby mace is best weapon Shops sell dragon, infinity, barrows, rares, bandos, obby maces, dragon weps, and pure items like zerker helms and neit helms...

item.title: HBG Scape V3 - OMFG - What you would like to see
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

thanks telenubby, I reported the spammer, and he cleaned my post, so nice once again thanks, and keep voting, and I dont think I can add all of them in 1 version, that would be like combining easter, xmas, and your b day in 1 day! ITS TOO MUCH Maybe in other future versions it will have it all lol, but for now, only 1 or 2, so vote vote vote!

Read full topic

@hah_bah_gee wrote:

ok, its close, its running between a new command and full working range…

Since a command is easy i might make both…

but KEEP VOTING, also check out HBG SCAPE PK EDITION NEWLY RELEASED! (actually releasing as we speak…)

item.title: HBG Scape V3 - OMFG - What you would like to see
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

o0 v 1 n o0:

I would like to see you make Npc’s attack back to start with

They already attack back on hiya if you restart anyways. Add full ranged if you can XD. That would be a challenge. Or do something with the minigames provided. I make a rfd minigame,fight caves but one of each tzhaar monster, champs dungeon minigame.

Read full topic
item.source: HBG Scape V3 - OMFG - What you would like to see

item.title: HBG Scape V3 - OMFG - What you would like to see
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

hmmm thats a decent request, but most of mine do…

I keep the training ones from attacking back because the point isnt to kill the narbs training

the ones that you kills for items do actually attack back…

I created jungle demon, he hits 50’s
Skele hellhound - 70 max
KQ i changed max to 70
Jad i changed max to 50

Those are the 4 main ones to kill for items…

Read full topic

hiya is czar based :l, I would like to see you add full ranged though :P. There is a hell load of glitchs with range, arrows don’t stack on ground, no long distance range (well a little), crossbows ( I’ve added that thanks to Whitey :]), d bow and crystal fix :s
